professional_summary: Experienced Applications Database Administrator with expertise in Oracle Applications (R12/11i), RAC databases, and database management tools. Skilled in database cloning, patching, performance monitoring, and cross-team collaboration.

work_experience.company: AT&T Global Business Services (India) Pvt. Ltd
key_responsibilities: Administering Oracle Applications R12/11i in single and multi-node environments.
Managing production databases on RAC systems with configurations including 2-node and 3-node setups.
Cloning APPS databases using RMAN technology
including cloning of RAC-RAC and RAC-Non RAC instances.
Administering production databases in a multi-node RAC system with Database versions 9i
Cloning Oracle Applications databases using methods like cold
